cern.colt
Interface Swapper

public interface Swapper

Interface for an object that knows how to swap elements at two positions (a,b).

Version:
1.0, 03-Jul-99
See Also:
GenericSorting

Method Summary
 void swap(int a, int b)
          Swaps the generic data g[a] with g[b].
